version_description:
- Fixes
* Popup box achievement counter fixed

* New Update *
With this update, some new features integrated into the game, but most importantly, a very special feature in the game engine.

* Statistics *
- A special area has been added to keep track of your character's actions in the game.

* Game Engine *
- The game engine is now much more flexible so we can publish much more improvements

* Fixes *
- Fixed a bug when joking
- Fixed a bug that increased game performance by 15%

- You can meet new people from devices with internet access.
- Think again before cheating on your lover!
- You can now trade gold coins at the bank.
- New profession: Banker!
- If you want to surrender for less punishment, go to the nearest police station
- New achievements, show everyone how rich you are!
- New event in the criminal world: Embezzlement!

- Fixed background music
- Improved overall performance

- Monster Hunter released
- New places added
- Market sells different items based on location
- Improved engine, it is a lot more faster
Don't mind us! We are adding some cool features :)
Don't mind us! We are adding some cool features :)
